title: Whipped Cream Cake
directions: Whip the egg whites to stiff peaks
Whip the cream to stiff peaks
Fold the egg whites into the whipped cream
Stir in the vanilla and water
Mix in the dry ingredients. Mix in about 1/4 of the dry ingredients in at a time.
Bake in a 9x9 pan, a tube pan or a bundt pan for 25 to 35 minutes (mine took 37 minutes) until a tester comes out clean.
Could add lemon zest to the mix, or put lemon curd, a fruit compote, chocolate or caramel syrup on top. Also tastes yummy with ice cream!
